amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Agricultural Research Service by $2 million and reduces funding for Foreign Assistance by $2.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Agricultural Research Service by $2 million and to reduce funding for Foreign Assistance by $2.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Nugent.
